About

Superclark is clark’s tech site

I come from wordpress, while i found jekyll is more flexiable, and even more interesting. So i come here. This website is main to record my learning path of software engineering. The theme used is based on Freshman theme.Best thanks to the author.

Proudly enjoy using my site ;).

I made this picture in my house, it’s created by film camera body Asahi Pentax Spotmatic SPII, and lens SMC Pentax 50mm F1.2.
